text: Sobrio was a municipality of the district Leventina in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. On 10 April 2016, it was merged into the municipality of Faido.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 27 April 2016 == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:2016 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Sobrio
